alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 28 at 6:14PM MST until July 28 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING FOR THE RAFAEL FIRE SCAR BURN SCAR REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR COCONINO AND YAVAPAI COUNTIES... At 611 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated only light rain to moderate rain over the Rafael fire scar. The threat for flash flooding has diminished for now. HAZARD...Be on the lookout for flooding in and around the Rafael Fire scar. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flooding of areas in and around the Rafael Fire scar. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... mainly rural areas of Coconino and Yavapai Counties This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Sycamore Creek, Railroad Draw, Tule Tank Wash, Spring Creek, Coffee Creek and JD Dam Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the Rafael Fire scar. Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving.
